Class: FormValidatorFactory

FormValidatorFactory

new FormValidatorFactory()

Represents a factory for constructing form validators.
Source:
  • FormValidatorFactory.js, line 9

Methods

create(fieldRules) → {FormValidator}

Creates a form validator pre-populated with rules passed in as "fieldRules". Format of "fieldRules" looks like: { "fieldName" : { "validatorName" : validatorSettings } }
Parameters:
Name Type Description
fieldRules Object Field validation rules.
Source:
  • FormValidatorFactory.js, line 21
